mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message(chat_message_id, chat_message_emp_no, chat_message_content, chat_message_type, chat_message_is_delete) VALUES (#{room}, #{sender}, #{message}, #{type}, false)
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_room SET chat_room_last_message = #{message} WHERE chat_room_idx = #{room}
mapper.select: SELECT c.chat_room_idx AS chatRoomIdx, c.chat_room_name AS chatRoomName, c.chat_room_last_message AS chatRoomLastMessage FROM chat_room c JOIN chat_room_member cm ON c.chat_room_idx = cm.chat_room_member_id WHERE chat_room_member_emp_no = #{empNo}
